title: [資訊] Tommaso：皮膚已在遊戲中
author: edwinyoo44
txt_content:
Tommaso Checchi：

Yay, skins are in the game, thanks to @jbernhardsson undefined 


Tommaso Checchi：

是的~皮膚已在遊戲中，要非常感謝 @jbernhardsson undefined
